inn1.comm: length delivery, angled across the batsman, no swing on that one, it goes to the keeper at 137 kph
gets this one to curve in to the batsman from short of length, de  Kock tries to whip it to the leg side, but gets hit on high on the thigh pad
bowls it full and wide, it's a yorker and the batsman digs it out to cover for a quick single
he shuffles across the crease and dabs the full delivery to the right of midwicket for an easy single
bowls on the length and headed to the off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot towards square leg
first one that beats the bat. This one is slightly short in length and keeps going away with the angle as de Kock plays inside the line
he stays back in the crease to a length delivery on off stump and defends it to midwicket. There was some shape on that delivery, but not excessive
length delivery just outside off, 141 kph, Amla comes forward and defends solidly
he loses direction on this one, fires it down the leg side
gets this one to cut in from a length, but Amla stays on the back foot and wrists it away between midwicket and square leg. The outfield slows it down
fuller length delivery and comes in after pitching, Amla keeps his bat close to the pads, and drops it towards cover for a quick single
length delivery on the pads at 138 kph, the batsman misses his flick shot, gets hit on the pads and it rolls behind square on the leg side
nice one to end the over from Shami. It pitches just back of length and seams away to beat the outside edge
keeps pitching it up and draws the batsman forward. De Kock drives it down the pitch and the bowler does the fielding
another fuller delivery, a half-volley this time, and de Kock drives it down the ground, past the non-striker. Excellent shot
immediately shortens the length and de Kock has to go on the back foot to defend it back to the bowler
another quick short delivery, but the direction is not right as the batsman watches it fly to the keeper over his left shoulder
another short ball, this time on the body, but de Kock was ready for that and slaps it in the air past square leg
fuller delivery this time, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid-on
starts off with a length delivery outside off, gets good carry on it as well after Amla leaves it alone
length delivery outside off, 135 kph, it cuts away after pitching but Amla steers it down to third man with ease
back of length delivery to de Kock, who defends it solidly off the back foot
big leading edge from the batsman as he tries to flick this one towards the leg side, but gets an edge past the third slip fielder
length delivery outside off and Amla dabs it in front of point and calls for a quick single
length ball on the pads, 136 kph, and the batsman clips it behind square on the leg side for quick single
bowls a fuller delivery at 144 kph outside off, the batsman pushes it firmly to mid-off
oh this is beautifully punched through cover, on the up, but the ball slows down towards the boundary. The batsman trusting that it's not going to swing much...
draws the outside edge but this falls short of Ashwin at first slip! It was short of length delivery and seamed away sharply, squaring up the batsman completely, but it drops well short of Ashwin
length delivery on off, 141 kph, the batsman punches it to mid-on
short of length delivery outside off at 138 kph, the batsman pulls it, but doesn't get much timing on that, straight to midwicket
back of length on the stumps, the batsman whips it straight to square leg this time
length delivery on off, 136 kph, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it wide of the mid-off fielder to pick up a quick single
another quick single, this time de Kock dabs it towards cover off the back foot and calls early
he stays on the back foot and punches a rising delivery to cover, but the fielder dives to his left to prevent runs
fuller delivery on off stump, Amla is not so keen to come forward but punches it comfortably to mid-on
length delivery on off, Amla sticks to the back foot and punches it on the up to cover

another outside edge, but the batsman was went hard at this one and it flew through the vacant third slip area quickly and down to the third man boundary. It was slightly short and wide and asked to be hit
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it on the up back to the bowler, who picks it up and fires it back at the stumps, and misses
short of length delivery on off stump, de Kock gets up on his toes and pushes it back to the bowler
attempts a short delivery, but this one sails over the head of the batsman and goes to Dhoni after a bounce..
gets up on his toes and drags the short of length delivery behind square on the leg side to pick up a single
on the pads at 136 kph. Amla stays in the crease and clips it to deep backward square leg with ease for a couple
keeps it tight on off stump and the batsman can only defend it back to the bowler
no swing for Shami, but he is bowling an accurate line here. Keeps it on off stump and Amla pushes it to mid-on off the back foot

length delivery on off and de Kock, with all that confidence, just comes forward and punches it on the up down the ground. Mid-off was wider and he dived for it, but couldn't stop it from heading to the boundary
short of length delivery, but it's on the pads and is easily flicked fine for a single
length delivery on off stump, 132 kph, the batsman stays on the back foot and defends it solidly
tries to be ambitious in playing this length delivery down the ground without getting closer to the line and is duly beaten by it.
another length delivery on off, the batsman has no room and he pushes it back to the bowler
back of length delivery on the body, the batsman whips it to fine leg to pick up a single
short of length delivery outside off but that is half-pulled, half-punched through midwicket, a shot of man high in confidence, that races away
follows it up with another super drive down the ground as the bowler corrected with a fuller length
bowls a length delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the back foot
too straight this time from Shami and de Kock easily flicks it to deep midwicket for a single

good accurate delivery on off stump that Amla punches to mid-on. But de Kock was setting off and had to return quickly as the throw is fired and it hits the stump direct. it's Jadeja. He gets in well in time
slightly short in length and too straight, Amla clips it to deep midwicket easily
length delivery on off stump, Amla comes forward belatedly and defends it to point
again, he stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery on off stump to the left of cover fielder for a single

oh this is awesome! There was nothing wrong with that delivery. Slightly short in length and on off stump, but de Kock whips it with a lot of timing through midwicket, it races away on a slow outfield
a half-hearted appeal as Ishant hits the pads, but that clearly pitched outside the leg stump line
now he finds the gap at wide mid-off with an on-the-up punch. Umesh from mid-off chases that and stops it while rolling in the sawdust.. looks like a beach there
and Amla opens up this time. It was a length delivery but there was width on it, Amla stays on the back foot and those silky hands generate a lot of power in punching it through cover point
flighted delivery on off, the batsman defends it with an open face to point
tossed up on off, he comes forward and pushes it to cover
more air by Ashwin, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover with ease for a single
he continues round the wicket to Amla, who defends the loopy delivery off the back foot

and he charges the next ball to launch it over the bowler's head! He didn't get to the pitch of it and didn't time it too well either, but the ball stops just before the boundary after losing it's kinetic energy on impact with the damp turf
he waits on the back foot and whips the length delivery to midwicket
bowls it flatter and the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
he waits in the crease for this to turn in slightly, then punches it to long off with ease
this one is well short, but there isn't much pace on it either. De Kock slaps it to deep midwicket
punches it to cover off the back foot
waits on the back foot and punches this length delivery firmly, but can't beat cover
slower and tossed up, Amla comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
slower and loopy, the batsman comes forward and drives it to deep cover for a single
bowls it shorter and flatter, Amla whips it to deep midwicket with a wristy flick
slower and tossed up, the batsman waits for it to come, then turns it to short fine leg for a single
on the pads again, it's clipped to backward square leg for another single
lots of air on this one and de Kock drives it down the ground to long on
this was slightly quicker and outside off, Amla went back to cut it, but gets a thick outside edge that runs down fine
fuller and tossed up, the batsman defends it to cover
shorter and quicker, de Kock wanted to hoick it over midwicket, but doesn't get any timing, plays it to the left of the fielder
he waits on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
tossed up and straight on off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
flatter delivery on off, the batsman punches it to long off for a single
slower and shorter, de Kock punches it firmly to deep cover for a single
too straight this time from Ashwin, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
tossed up wide outside off, the batsman stretches forward and drives it to deep cover
there are shouts of catch it as Amla comes out of the crease and lofts this one towards long on. But it drops well short of the fielder
tossed up and slow on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
slow and flighted on off, the batsman punches it down the ground to long off
he tossed it up but gave room outside off as well, Amla just launches it with ease over the infield with an inside out shot
comes down the pitch and takes it on the full to drive it to deep midwicket
he goes deep in the crease and punches it to long off for a single
he gets an outside edge through gully as he comes forward to drive for a couple
quicker delivery on the pads and he fails to get it away
tossed up on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
on the pads again, this time he flicks it fine on the leg side to continue his good run and get to his half-century
tossed up on off, and slow at 82 kph, the batsman dabs it to cover for a quick single
it's on the pads and Amla goes on the back foot to clip it to fine leg
good loopy delivery from Ashwin, de Kock comes forward and defends
and he again presents forward defence to a flighted delivery
only slightly short and the batsman went on the back foot to cut it, but gets a thick outside edge that drops short of point
he is squared up as he tries to whip the length delivery to the on side, but picks up a single to point
de Kock stands up tall and punches it to long off for a single
and they keep picking up singles with ease, this time it's pushed to long on
flatter and shorter outside off, now de Kock punches it to long on
he stays in the crease and punches it straight to cover
makes room and tries to punch it past cover, but can't beat the fielder
no movement of the feet from Amla, but his quick hands make sure it goes quickly to the fielder at long off
length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to cover
slower and fuller on off, the batsman drives it to wide long off for a single
he comes round the wicket, but it's pushed to long on with soft hands and they come back for second to bring up another 100 of their partnership
he tries to whip this one to the leg side, but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
straighter this time, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
fuller delivery outside off, de Kock goes forward and with a wristy flick, turns it to deep square leg and it's drinks
short of length and outside off, cut firmly to sweeper cover and they take two quickly
full on leg this time, swept to short fine leg and they go for a quick single again. It's hit the stumps as Dhoni collected the ball and sent it through his legs but Amla is well inside
short of length outside off and turns in, pushed to long-on for one
flatter on middle, turned straight to midwicket
short of length outside off, de Kock stays back and pulls it hard to long-on
turns in after pitching on middle, Amla defends it to midwicket
angled in and on the leg stump, helped to short fine leg and Ashwin misfields there to give them two
on middle this time, pushed down straight down the wicket for one
back of length and coming in from outside off, turned to deep square leg off the hips
short and wide outside off, de Kock cuts hard to Ishant in the deep
on length and around off, Amla defends it back to Kohli
from wide of the crease and full outside off, driven straight to cover
on length outside off, pushed down to long-off for one
on length outside off, Amla goes back and powers it on the off side with a backfoot drive to pierce the gap between cover and extra cover for four
outside off again and pushed down to long-off for one
pitches it up and de Kock dances down to flick it over the infield for four on the leg side. Good use of the feet and he lofted it flamingo style
slightly flighted outside off, pushed down
back of length on middle and leg, tucked to deep midwicket
on length on the stumps, pushed down to long-on for one
full on middle from wide of the crease, driven back to Kohli
on length outside off, driven down firmly to long-off
full toss on off and de Kock launches it over midwicket for four! 'Catch it' said Dhoni but it was far from Raina at midwicket
back of length delivery, tucked to short fine leg for one
on length outside off, driven down to long-off for one and another useful over or SA
and Amla gets to his half-century with a easy push to long on. Loud cheer from his home crowd
he comes forward and eases it to deep cover for a single
now he waits for this slightly shorter one and smashes it through extra cover for yet another boundary
bowls it with a pause, but the batsman easily clips it to deep square leg for a single
tossed up and slower outside off, the batsman defends it to point
another one of those bowled with a pause, but it's short and quick outside off, de Kock flat bats it to deep midwicket
defended back to the bowler off the front foot
he comes forward to push it to cover, but gets an inside edge to deep square leg for a single
slower and on the middle stump line, the batsman punches it to the bowler
he takes a step forward and drives the half volley to long off
tossed up delivery on off, de Kock opens the face and steers it to deep cover
slower and slightly shorter, punched with some power to deep cover for a single
he flicks it to backward square leg for a single
he waits for the ball to come in and pushes it to midwicket for an easy single
allows it to turn in, then nudges it away to fine leg for another single
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman chops it on to point
flatter and quicker on the stumps, de Kock works it away to midwicket for a single
bowls a flighed delivery with a pause, but Amla flicks it from off stump to deep midwicket
they are not even breaking into sweat, eased to long off for a single
he skips down the track to launch it over the bowler's head, but gets a thick inside edge to backward square leg
a loud shout for lbw as Jadeja hits the pads. Amla was looking to work this away to the leg side, and was hit in front of the leg stump. It probably just pitched outside the line of legstump
again, he pushes it through midwicket for a single
now de Kock slaps it to deep midwicket for a single
he clips the half-volley behind square, but that goes straight to short fine leg
slightly short in length and de Kock cuts it hard to deep point for a single
he comes down the pitch, but Ashwin pulls the length back. Amla defends it back to the bowler
punches this one with the turn to midwicket
bowls it with the pause, and Amla punches this one back at him
now tries to be too straight, but this one spins down the leg side
very slow, loopy and a lot of turn and bounce on that one, it surprised Amla as he got an inside edge on to his pads
flatter again, it's punched to deep midwicket with ease
some turn for Jadeja here, but Amla punches it back to the bowler
he makes little room and chops it to backward point for a single
tossed up outside off, the batsman waits and defends it towards point
fuller delivery outside off and de Kock reverse sweeps it, but straight to Ishant at short third man
oh he clears his front leg out and slog sweeps the full delivery through deep midwicket, it just lands a meter short of the boundary
quicker delivery and it hits the pad as the batsman tries to work it to the leg side
again bowls it with a pause, but it causes no effect as it's punched with ease to long on
he stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover for a single
oh some turn and bounce again, as it beats the outside edge but bounced over the off stump
he gives himself some room and cuts it hard to deep cover for a single
full and tossed up on the middle stump line, it's driven to long on for a single
he waits on the back foot and nudges one from outside off to midwicket for a single
he works this away to deep midwicket for a single
more shouts of catch it as Amla lofts the full delivery with an inside out shot, but it's well in the gap and they come back for a second
full delivery, another inside out drive, this time along the ground to wide long off
pushes this one back to the bowler
waits for it to turn in, then whips it away to fine leg for a single
he waits in the crease and punches this one down to long off
length delivery on the pads and Amla flicks it in the air towards midwicket, he could have played it anywhere really
on the stumps and he nudges this behind square on the leg side
length delivery on off stump, no room on that and de Kock defends it to point
bowls a slower one on the stumps and de Kock defends it to midwicket

oh some activity here in the middle! de Kock stood up and slapped a short of length delivery straight down the ground, Raina at mid-on dives to stop the ball, but both batsmen were thinking of a single. Amla though gets back before Raina's throws down the stumps at non-striker's end
he waits and opens the face to run this one down to third man for a single
he clips this one off the pads to midwicket for an easy single
he just stands tall and eases it to deep extra cover like he is swatting flies while lying on his bed.. what a player
gets an inside edge to the leg side as he looks to defends this one
he comes forward and drives it down to long on for a single
full delivery outside off and de Kock moves to 98 with a drive to the cow corner, some excellent use of wrists in that shot
this one is much straighter and pushed straight to long on
he gets there with a dab to midwicket, and he gets to his third century in ODIs.. All have come in a month. The youngster has found his wheels.
he tests Amla with a quick short delivery, but Amla gets under it in time
he waits in the crease and dabs the length delivery to the right of Dhoni for a quick single
short of length delivery outside off and he wanted to thrash it to midwicket boundary, gets it on the toe of the bat though as he ends up playing it towards mid on
full delivery on the middle stump and this time he smashes it from its presence, but there is protection in the deep and the fielder from deep square leg runs around to cut it off
another bouncer from Ishant and Amla goes for a pull, but makes no contact
he comes round the wicket and beats the bat, but the ball dies on Dhoni and the batsmen run a bye
quick short delivery again at Amla, who goes for a hook shot, and gets a glove on it as this one runs down to the fine-leg boundary
back of length and it comes in sharply  to hit the thigh pad. Loud appeal for something
he makes room and comes down the pitch too, and drives this one beautifully through extra cover for a boundary
this time he stays in the crease, but gets cramped for room as this one comes in sharply, hits the thigh pad and rolls towards backward point
short and wide, Amla cracks this one off the back foot, but finds the man at point

oh it ends in an anti-climactic fashion! It was a full delivery and he connected well with his sweep, but de Kock is disappointed as he hits it straight to the man at square leg. End of another effortless innings
flatter delivery on off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
flighted outside off, AB steers it to deep point easily
slow and with vicious turn in. Amla was rooted to the crease and didn't expect that, it bounced over the stumps after hitting the top of his pad
and straightaway, AB gets on with it, with a reverse sweep past short third man for a couple
slow and flat outside off, Amla punches it off the back foot to deep cover

oh some turn and AB is walking off straightaway! It was a typical left-arm spinner's delivery, coming in from round the wicket, and turning away. AB stretched forward to push it straight down the ground, but didn't account for the spin. Dhoni takes the bails off in a flash and AB has to go.
and immediately he steps out of the crease to punch it to long on for a single. That brings 200 for South Africa
he stays still and punches it back to the bowler
makes some room, but Jadeja fires it full on the leg stump and Amla punches it back to the bowler
stays on the back foot and cuts the flatter delivery to deep point
bowls a short of length delivery that is easily steered down to third man by Amla
short delivery on off stump and JP swats it to square leg fir a single
length delivery on off, Amla chooses to play it off the back foot and dabs it behind point for a single
fuller delivery, it's pushed straight to cover, who fires a throw at non-striker's end only to give away overthrows
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it straight to cover
back of length delivery on off, JP was looking for a pull but changed it at the last moment to drop it to the off side, they decide to take a quick single
he stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery
full delivery outside off and it's pushed straight to point
another full delivery on the stumps, JP runs hard for the first after hitting it to deep midwicket, but the fielder prevents the second
he pushes this one to cover for a single
full delivery on off and JP drives it to long on for a single
on the pads and Amla dabs it to midwicket
length delivery outside off stump, JP stands tall and punches it to deep cover for a single
short of length delivery wide outside off, Amla hops and cuts it through backward point, but the slowness in the outfield allows the third man fielder to cut it off
he waits in the crease and opens the face very late to guide the length delivery to third man
bowls a yorker wide outside off that is blocked straight to point
back of length and on the pads, it's clipped away to fine leg for a single
he shuffles across the crease to whip a length delivery on middle stump to fine leg for a single
he stays on the back foot and punches it to long off for a single
he comes down the pitch and drives this one to long on for a single
now Amla steps out of the crease and manoeuvres the full delivery to deep midwicket
short and with some room outside off but JP misses out as he cuts it straight to point
quicker delivery on the middle and JP wanted to turn it to the leg side, but ends up pushing it back to the bowler
he stays in the crease and clips a flatter delivery to deep square leg for a single
full delivery on off and Amla drives it on the up, but straight to the man at mid-off
he dabs the length delivery towards mid-off with soft hands and calls for a quick single
short delivery from Umesh, JP has plenty of time to get under that one
he stays in the crease and guides the back of length delivery outside off to third man for a single
tries to punch it on the up towards cover, but he gets an inside edge to midwicket
he shuffles across and pushes one to mid-on off the inside half of the bat for another quick single
full, flighted and a touch slow too, Amla moves on to 97 with a flick to deep midwicket
this one was turning down the leg side, but JP gets some bat on that to pick up a quick single to short fine leg
he stands tall and punches it to deep point for a single
wow, how did that make it so quickly to the boundary! He stands tall and just punches it past the cover fielder and the ball just keeps runnings away
he comes forward and dabs it to the left of midwicket for a single
he waits in the crease, then chops it to deep point for a single
and the machine gets to his 12th century in ODIs with an easy dab to backward point. He has hardly looked in any trouble
back of length on the pads and JP whips it to deep midwicket for a single

oh another wicket from nowhere from India! Just like de Kock was dismissed against the run of play, now Amla get a feather to this slower bouncer en route to the gloves of Dhoni. He was looking to slap it through off, but the extra tennis-ball type bounce probably messed up with the timing of his bat swing..
he gets a big leading edge off the first delivery as he tries to work it away to the leg side, it goes along the ground to cover
another short delivery, but this one is way down the leg side
length delivery on off stump and Miller has to come forward and defend

another wicket! This one goes to the bowler! It was a fuller length delivery and heading for the middle stump, Miller plays for the angle, but it just comes in a touch. Hang on, there is a tiny inside edge on that, so Miller is unfortunate on that one, but it looked out to the naked eye
a lot of turn and some extra bounce on this one, but it spins down the leg side
he comes down the pitch but yorks himself and has to jam this back to the bowler
slower this time from Jadeja and JP can only push it back to the bowler
on the pads and slower, JP turns it away to backward square leg for a single
he takes his first runs with a neat push to deep cover for a single
again skips out of the crease to push the full delivery to long on
flatter and quicker on the middle stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
back of length delivery on the stumps, JP has no room and he pushes it to mid-on for a quick single
short delivery again, the batsman sways out of the line straightaway, but that's called a wide for height a bit harshly
back of length and coming in a touch, Kallish dabs it to point
full delivery on off stump and Kallis drives it firmly, but is not able to beat the man at mid-off
a slower offcutter on the middle stump line, this cuts in and hits Kallis on his inner thighs as he looks to smash it over midwicket
oh wow! Kallis gets only one for this one-the-up drive over the infield, but that just shows the class, the deep point cuts it off
fuller delivery on off, JP drives it down the ground with enough timing to beat the diving mid-off fielder
length delivery on the stumps and it's in Kallis' arc, he swings it high and over the infield, but it goes high rather than long. The mid-on fielder runs backwards and retrieves it
a yorker from Ishant Sharma! Kallis blocks it out towards the bowler, who gets a hand to it as the ball rolls past the umpire

short of length delivery outside off, Duminy has to wait a touch extra because it comes slow off the pitch. He then slaps it to deep midwicket and calls for a second. But he was stuggling to make it back, he dives, but is not able to beat the throw at the striker's end
another yorker on the middle stump, and Kallis can only dig it out to long on for a single
he beats the bat with a length delivery outside off as McLaren tries to blast it through covers
another quick delivery hits Kallis' thigh as he tries to swing it out of the ground
fuller length delivery outside off and Kallis drives it firmly, but straight to mid off
attempts a yorker but it ends up being a low full toss that is whipped away over midwicket, he got it off the toe of his bat, but it had enough to beat the two fielders converging on it
It's timbaa!It was full and fast, not quite a yorker, but a full length delivery. It tails in just a touch to creep under Kallis' swing towards the leg side and takes out the leg stump
full delivery on off stump, Philander drives it down the ground to long on for a single
short delivery and that made a nice cracking sound when it met with McLaren's bat. He was quick on the pull  and slaps it over square leg for a boundary
bowls a slower delivery outside off that is dragged to deep midwicket by Philander
whoa! Length deilvery on the pads and McLaren swings it over square leg with awesome power! Lands in the same stands where once Yuvraj Singh hit Brett Lee during a T20 semi-final
high full toss wide outside off and McLaren slices it over the infield to pick up a single
lucky runs, but Philander won't mind! He was making room and gets a bottom edge past the keeper for a boundary
he gives it a big swing, and gets a thick inside edge that beats the deep backward square leg fielder
length delivery wide outside off, there is not edge on this one, it's off the middle and over mid-off for a one bounce four

inn2.comm: not the same start as the last match, this was full and going down the leg side, Rohit flicks it to the left of fine leg
on the pads again, no swing like in the last match and again Rohit clips it to deep backward square leg
and he finds his radar back! Outside off and swings it away, Rohit pushes forward but is beaten by the shape on that
fuller delivery on off stump, the batsman closes the face on this as he pushes it to midwicket
he comes forward this time to push a length delivery to cover
length delivery on off stump and Rohit reaches out before steering it to third man
he gets nice shape on this delivery but it swings down the leg side
nicely bowled! Again, this one comes in to the right-hander, who was pushing at it without taking the swing into account and gets an inside edge past the stumps to the keeper
this one keeps going away with the angle and Rohit leaves it alone
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to cover
another angled delivery by Tsotsobe and the batsman gets room with it, Rohit waits for it and cuts it behind point nicely for his first boundary
he comes forward and gets behind the line of this to defend it to cover
he stays in the crease and opens the face of the bat to defend the length delivery to point
Dhawan is beaten on the first ball he faces, as he plays for the inswing, but this keeps going away with the angle

and he is gone, caught at point! another length delivery outside off and Dhawan tends to go for these ones, that's what he does, but he is not able to keep it down and it goes straight to the throat of the backward point fielder
he is welcomed with a quick short delivery to which he takes his eyes off. Fortunately for the batsman, that is a bit leg-sidish and goes past his left elbow
length delivery outside off, goes straight on, but Kohli keeps his bat away from it
he comes forward and gets on top of that one to defend it to cover
another short ball! Vicious one! Kohli again caught in a awkward position and again luckily for him it just bounces over the head, and over the keeper
follows it up with an outswinger to which Kohli comes forward and defends to point
angles this one away from the right hander and Rohit calmly lets it go through
pushes it a touch fuller, but it's still outside off and is left alone again
and he keeps repeating the same line outside off, Rohit leaves it alone
he shortens the length this time and Rohit goes on the back foot to dab it towards cover for a quick single

and now Kohli is gone for a duck! Tsotsobe strikes with an angled delivery outside off which was slightly short in length. The batsman tried to steer it down to third man, but it just skims off the face of the bat to the keeper.
length delivery outside off, he stands tall on his toes and defends to cover
length delivery outside off and Rohit comes forward to push it to cover
he is working up some steam here, this one is 145.2 kph, and outside off. Rohit leaves it alone, but Steyn walks all the way upto him with a fiery stare
short of length delivery on off and he hops on his toes to tuck it to square leg for a single
more fire from Steyn as this one takes off and goes over the helmet
more short stuff, but this one is a little outside off. Rahane stays away from the line, but there is a buzz now as Steyn is steaming in every ball
and another short ball! Rahane ducks under it belatedly and awkwardly. Steyn sensing fear here?
short of length and a touch wide, Rohit cuts it through gully and the fielder at third man runs around to make a good save
fuller delivery going across the batsman, Rahane comes forward and lets it go through
another short ball! This one was slower and Rahane went in for a pull, but gets beaten as the ball arrives after he is through with the shot
fuller delivery on off, he comes forward and drives it to mid-off
back of length delivery on off and middle and Rahane hops and nudges it behind square leg for a single
short ball at Rohit! and he has completely mistimed this! He was looking to play this over square leg, but it just lobs over the short midwicket fielder.
length delivery outside off at 142 kph, the batsman leaves it alone
another short ball, but again it's a touch outside off and Rahane stays away from it
length delivery on off, no swing on this one and Rahane pushes it with soft hands to extra cover for a quick single to get away from strike

length delivery and Rohit was a gonner had the fielder from cover hit the stumps direct! it's Miller! Rohit dabbed it to cover and hesitated before going through and would have been left stranded by a mile had that hit
short ball and this is well played by Rahane, who pulls it in a controlled manner to deep backward square leg
full and fast, a bit wide outside off, Rahane leaves it alone
length delivery on the pads and Rohit tries to flick it on the on side, but is a touch early on the shot. He gets a leading edge back down the pitch
oh this one is smashed off the back foot as Loppsy gives the batsman some room. It was a touch short too and Rohit slaps it over point
he comes forward and eases this length delivery to the off side, but can't beat cover

caught at short midwicket! This is going the same way as the first one! It was a short of length delivery on the body and Rohit goes for his usual front-foot pull and gets it on the middle too, but he is unable to keep it down. Hashim Amla at short midwicket times his jump to perfection to pluck this one out! Excellent reflex catch there. Loppsy is elated
he jumps on the crease to a length delivery  and gets an outside edge towards point
now he slips in a full delivery and Raina was stuck in the crease, luckily for him, this went down the leg side
length delivery with a bit of width and Raina cracks it hard off the back foot, but straight to the man at point
nicely timed by Rahane, who hops on to his toes and gets over this length delivery to punch it through cover point
back of length delivery wide outside off but Rahane doesn't take the bait, leaves it alone
length delivery on off stump and Rahane is a bit late to come forward as he pushes it to mid on

short and wide and another wicket! This one was close to the wide marker, but Rahane, unlike two balls ago, chases this one. De Kock takes it and is the first one to appeal, then everyone appeals and the umpire raises the finger
he bowls short of length outside off, and Dhoni steers it to third man for a single
he is already on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to cover
he walks out of the crease and defends the length delivery to cover
he again steps out of the crease and punches it on the up to cover
he shuffles across the crease and pushes the length delivery to mid-on
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it off the back foot to cover
he stays in the crease as he defends the length ball to mid off
fuller length from the bowler this time, Dhoni stays in the crease and pushes it to mid on
he hops and clips this off his hips for a couple to deep backward square leg
another back of length delivery to Raina, who jumps on his toes as he defends this to the leg side
he pushes this one too far down the leg side
angled across the left-hander, who for a chance, lets this one go
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman gets on top of this and chops it to third man
he stays on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to cover
this one takes off from a length and beats the bat as Dhoni tries to push it to the off side
it cuts away after pitching on short of length and Raina, who was on the back foot, steers it to third man
he shuffles across the stumps and works away the back of length delivery from outside off to behind square on the leg side
now Raina shuffles across and pushes the length delivery to Amla at midwicket
short delivery and Raina plays it well, keeping it down, as he pulls it to deep square leg
he shuffles across the stumps and tucks this from the middle stump to fine leg
he jumps up and defends the back of length delivery to backward point
this stays low as Dhoni defends it to midwicket
short and on the pads, Dhoni works it away to deep square leg
he comes forward and defends the flighted delivery back to the bowler
another tossed up delivery, it's defended to the bowler
works it to square leg for a quick single
some hesitation as Dhoni pushes this to the right of midwicket, but he ball passes the fielder and they complete the run
back of length delivery on the stumps and Dhoni tucks it away to deep square leg for a single
short delivery but this is comfortably pulled down to fine leg
another short delivery, this one is outside off and it's powerfully pulled to deep backward square leg
another short ball, but there is not much pace on this and Raina pulls it to deep midwicket with ease
length delivery outside off, Dhoni punches it to mid-off off the back foot
he rocks back and defends the back of length delivery solidly to mid on
tossed up and full and Dhoni goes for the sweep, but misses and gets hit on the pads
he goes on the back foot and works away the length delivery to deep midwicket
it keeps coming with the arm and Raina punches it to cover off the back foot
short and outside off, stays a touch low too as Raina punches it to deep cover
he goes down on his knee early and sweeps this one straight to short fine leg
he stays in the crease and punches this one to mid off who is standing a bit deep
he punches this past the stumps at the non-striker's end, but it's chased down by the mid on fielder
length delivery outside off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket off the back foot
he comes forward this time and defends the length delivery to point
short ball and this is pulled well down to fine leg easily
back of length delivery on off and Dhoni goes back to whip it to fine leg
he nudges this off his pads to the left of midwicket for a quick single and it's time for drinks
on length outside off, pushed straight to cover
beats outside off. It pitched on length and turned away a bit as Raina leaned forward to defend
slightly shorter outside off and Raina goes back to defend it towards cover
back of length outside off and turning away, driven to deep cover for one
pitches it on leg, Dhoni works it to deep fine leg
pitched up on off, Raina leans forward and blocks
short ball on off and middle, Dhoni goes back and works it to deep fine leg for one
back of length outside off, tucked to midwicket
short of length around off, Raina stays on the back foot and pulls it square of deep fine leg and they come back for two. Raina slipped while turning back for the second and is hurt a little bit
on length outside off, Raina defends on the of side
on length close to off, Raina tries to cut it late but it goes past the inside edge
slightly short on leg, Raina goes on his toes and defends to midwicket
Dhoni comes down to the length delivery on leg and works it for a single
on length on middle and leg, defends it to midwicket
full on leg and Raina sweeps it past short fine leg for four
on length on leg, tucked towards short fine leg for a single
full on middle and leg, Dhoni turns it to deep midwicket
full on middle, Raina leans forward and blocks
full and outside off, Dhoni punches it through the covers for two
short ball just outside off, Dhoni pushes it towards cover for one
length delivery outside off, Raina cuts and misses
on length on the stumps, tucked to the leg side for a single

great catch from QDK! It was just outside off, Dhoni didn't move much and pushed at it and managed a thick outside edge. It was probably going past the keeper and de Kock leapt to his right to take the low catch
teasing line outside off, Jadeja looks to play but leaves it at the end
short of length ball on the pads and Raina half-scoops, half-pulls it over square leg for a couple
on the pads this time and he shuffles across and tickles it fine on the leg side
short of length delivery and he pulls it to the right of fine leg fielder
on the pads again and Raina gets hit this time, but it was pitched outside leg stump
short of length delivery that comes in with the angle, Jadeja defends
he stays on the back foot and defends this solidly
he bowls a length delivery to start off, but this is comfortably down the leg side
back of length delivery outside off, but Raina was in the position to play a pull early and drags it down to fine leg
another back of length delivery, the batsman works it away to deep square leg off the back foot
another boundary, one of the more convincing pulls from Raina, and he finds the gap at deep backward square leg
slower delivery outside leg stump and it flicks the pads on it's way to the keeper
another slower delivery and this one turns like an offspinner, stays low too. Raina nudges it behind square on the leg side for a single
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery back to the bowler
he wanted to flat bat this down the ground, but it hits him on the sticker of his bat, high up close to the shoulder, and limps past the non-striker
stays behind the line of that and punches it to cover for a quick single
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery, with crouched knees, towards point
hops on his toes and works it off his hips to fine leg for a single
he charges down the pitch to a length delivery, but doesn't get it off the middle as he pushes it past the bowler

oh that is some awesome catch! David Miller takes a stinger at cover! Raina moved his front leg out and blasted that length delivery towards cover. He timed it well and that was off the middle too. But Miller shows super reactions to bend down and take the low catch. Raina watches in disbelief for a few seconds before trudging off
oi! That was close too. Jadeja cuts the back of length delivery hard and it drops just short of point
he shuffles across and plays the back of length delivery with ease to deep backward square leg
short delivery but this one is wide outside off
he steps out of the crease, but McLaren bowls a short of length slower delivery. Jadeja has to adjust as he tucks it to point
another slower delivery, Jadeja waits and guides it to third man for a single
he walks across the stumps and works the length ball with ease to deep midwicket
back of length delivery on the stumps, Jadeja comes forward and defends it to cover
Ashwin keeps moving across the stumps and looks at ease as he flicks this one to fine leg for a single
he tucks this back of length delivery to midwicket, but turns down the single that Ashwin was keen on
whoa!!! Where did that come from! He steps out and gives the length delivery one mighty thwack! That has gone miles into the grass banks over cow corner
he responds with a quick short ball and Jadeja stays quietly behind the line and ducks under it
he tucks it away to midwicket for a quick single
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to cover
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot to cover
he stays in the crease and glides this back of length delivery to third man for a single
he shuffles across the stumps and punches the back of length delivery to wide mid on for a single
he stays rooted to the crease and throws his bat at this short and wide delivery, finds the boundary at deep backward point
on the pads and he nudges it to square leg for a single
it's a length delivery outside off and Ashwin pushes it to point
he oversteps as he delivers this short of length delivery which is pushed to cover
and Morkel bowls a quick short delivery that sails over the bat. Jadeja tries to swat it, but makes no connection
charges down the pitch again and wanted to smash it over cover, but this quick and shortish, 146 kph, it beats the bat easily
nasty bouncer around his throat and Jadeja was not in control as he fended at that. Luckily for him, it deflects towards third man
he stays on the back foot and steers it down to third man for a single
another short ball, but this one is down the leg side and called a wide
keeps it on short of length, but Jadeja tucks it to third man easily
fuller length this time from Morkel and Ashwin pushes it to cover
back of length and outside off, Jadeja cuts it hard to third man for a single
he stays on the back foot and defends this one to cover
he stays back in the crease and defends the back of length delivery with ease
this one is wide and Ashwin chases it too but makes no connection
he works it away towards the leg side with a wristy flick but Miller at midwicket dives and makes an excellent save
gets up on his toes and punches the length delivery to deep extra cover
he comes forward and pushes it to cover, but an overthrow allows for an extra run
bowls a length delivery outside off and Ashwin defends the comfortably
back of length delivery outside off and that's as good a shot as any. Ashwin stays upright and punches it easily through cover, off the back foot
he pitches it further up and Ashwin pushes it to mid off with relative ease
short delivery and that is again swatted away to deep square leg like a top-order batsman, along the ground too
he stays on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery to point
he waits in the crease and defends the length delivery to the off side
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery towards point
he gets a thick leading edge towards the vacant mid-off area as he tries to work it away to the leg side
more runs towards the third-man region as Jadeja guides another one
he stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to cover point
they keep picking runs to third man, another one off the back foot
defends this towards cover off the back fooot
he gets behind the line easily and defends the back of length delivery to the bowler
stylishly guided to point off the back foot
he stays solid and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
he bowls a quick delivery on off stump that is easily defended to midwicket

and it's over for Ashwin! Steyn gets the wicket with a wide delivery! It was a short ball wide outside off and the batsman wanted to pull it from there, he gets a faint tickle on this one. Similar to the way Rahane got out
he gets squared up with a short of length delivery, but manages to pick up a single to third man
he comes forward and drives this one to deep cover for a single
back of length with some width outside off, the batsman cuts it hard to third man for a single
short of length delivery on the body and it comes a bit slow off the pitch! Shami gets hit on his body as he misses the ball
this one is a quick short ball and Shami wanted to pull it, but makes no connection
he clears this front leg out and gives this a proper slog, that goes high, but not long and lands around deep midwicket before the fielder from deep square leg comes in
he is going to throw is bat at everything it seems as he slaps the back of length delivery to deep midwicket again
the flatter delivery is whipped to deep square leg for a single
slightly shorter and Jadeja has to wait a bit before cutting it hard to deep point
he almost drives it back to the bowler, but it drops just short
stays in the crease and punches it to long on for a single
he comes forward and dabs it for a single to cover, but a ricochet allows the batsman to pick up an extra
on the pads and Jadeja turns it straight to backward square leg
he gets a full delivery that he slices down to third man for a single

AB you beauty! Jadeja gets a length delivery to which he throws his bat, he wanted to hit the sight screen, but this goes high and straight. AB de Villiers, however, lines himself up coming in from long on and leaps in the air to pick this one right on the edge. Wonderful judgment there from the SA captain
back of length delivery from Loppsy is tucked to the left of backward point for a single
he moves outside leg stump and swings his bat at that, but misses it completely. Loppsy smiles
a slower ball this time, but again the batsman is beaten outside off
now a quick short ball, Shami attempts a pull anyway but again, makes no connection
he bowls a short delivery outside off and the batsman lets this one go
another poke and a miss from the batsman as this one flies quickly to the keeper
and this one beats the bat and somehow beats the middle stump too! Just bounces over
not this time! Steyn takes the middle stump out of the ground! This was full, fast and straight. Umesh tried to whip it across the line, but was too slow
and another one beats the bat outside off as Ishant fishes for it
he gets an outside edge this time and it goes to the third slip fielder on the bounce
and more sounds of leather on timber! The series has been wrapped with a slower ball that hits the off stump as the batsman looks to swing it away
